title: Kindred spirits
creator_credit: Alan Burke, ABC-TV (Australia) and Alan Fisk
brief_description: Julie Nelson, a young dancer on the Sydney club circuit, witnesses the drowning of a young man and finds her life falling apart. It is a horrifying experience, but what becomes even more disturbing is that his presence continues to haunt her. The key to the mystery is held and withheld by an eccentric old lady.
